text: @TMobile @Tesla I would take this Tesla’s to my dads house! He deserves a car!! He is such a hard worker and has been saving up for months not to get a car. Covid-19 really messed up his plans to get a new car and buy a house! Love y’all!❤️ @TMobile @Tesla #TMobileTuesdays + #contest Goodluck!!

domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Brand Category
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands
